ZoneIngressOverview.title: Zone Ingress Overview
ZoneIngressOverview.description: ZoneIngressOverview defines the projected state of a ZoneIngress.

responses_sent.description: Number of xDS responses sent to the Dataplane.

responses_acknowledged.description: Number of xDS responses ACKed by the Dataplane.

responses_rejected.description: Number of xDS responses NACKed by the Dataplane.

kuma.mesh.v1alpha1.DiscoveryServiceStats.title: Discovery Service Stats
kuma.mesh.v1alpha1.DiscoveryServiceStats.description: DiscoveryServiceStats defines all stats over a single xDS service.

control_plane_instance_id.description: Control Plane instance that handled given subscription.

connect_time.description: Time when a given Dataplane connected to the Control Plane.

disconnect_time.description: Time when a given Dataplane disconnected from the Control Plane.

version.description: Version of Envoy and Kuma dataplane

generation.description: Generation is an integer number which is periodically increased by the status sink

kuma.mesh.v1alpha1.DiscoverySubscription.title: Discovery Subscription
kuma.mesh.v1alpha1.DiscoverySubscription.description: DiscoverySubscription describes a single ADS subscription created by a Dataplane to the Control Plane. Ideally, there should be only one such subscription per Dataplane lifecycle. Presence of multiple subscriptions might indicate one of the following events: - transient loss of network connection between Dataplane and Control Plane - Dataplane restart (i.e. hot restart or crash) - Control Plane restart (i.e. rolling update or crash) - etc

last_update_time.description: Time when status of a given ADS subscription was most recently updated.

total.description: Total defines an aggregate over individual xDS stats.

kuma.mesh.v1alpha1.DiscoverySubscription.title: Discovery Subscription Status
kuma.mesh.v1alpha1.DiscoverySubscription.description: DiscoverySubscriptionStatus defines status of an ADS subscription.

port.description: Port on which Envoy Admin API server will be listening

build.description: Full build tag of Envoy version

kumaDpCompatible.description: True iff Envoy version is compatible with Kuma DP version

kuma.mesh.v1alpha1.EnvoyVersion.title: Envoy Version
kuma.mesh.v1alpha1.EnvoyVersion.description: EnvoyVersion describes details of Envoy version

gitTag.description: Git tag of Kuma Dataplane version

gitCommit.description: Git commit of Kuma Dataplane version

buildDate.description: Build date of Kuma Dataplane version

kumaCpCompatible.description: True iff Kuma DP version is compatible with Kuma CP version

kuma.mesh.v1alpha1.KumaDpVersion.title: Kuma Dp Version
kuma.mesh.v1alpha1.KumaDpVersion.description: KumaDpVersion describes details of Kuma Dataplane version

dependencies.description: Versions of other dependencies, i.e. CoreDNS

kuma.mesh.v1alpha1.Version.title: Version
kuma.mesh.v1alpha1.Version.description: Version defines version of Kuma Dataplane and Envoy

zone.description: Zone field contains Zone name where ingress is serving, field will be automatically set by Global Kuma CP

networking.description: Networking defines the address and port of the Ingress to listen on. Additionally publicly advertised address and port could be specified.

availableServices.description: AvailableService contains tags that represent unique subset of endpoints

envoy.description: EnvoyConfiguration provides additional configuration for the Envoy sidecar.

kuma.mesh.v1alpha1.ZoneIngress.title: Zone Ingress
kuma.mesh.v1alpha1.ZoneIngress.description: ZoneIngress allows us to configure dataplane in the Ingress mode. In this mode, dataplane has only inbound interfaces. Every inbound interface matches with services that reside in that cluster.

instances.description: number of instances available for given tags

mesh.description: mesh of the instances available for given tags

externalService.description: instance of external service available from the zone

address.description: Address on which inbound listener will be exposed

advertisedAddress.description: AdvertisedAddress defines IP or DNS name on which ZoneIngress is accessible to other Kuma clusters.

port.description: Port of the inbound interface that will forward requests to the service.

advertisedPort.description: AdvertisedPort defines port on which ZoneIngress is accessible to other Kuma clusters.

admin.description: Admin contains configuration related to Envoy Admin API

subscriptions.description: List of ADS subscriptions created by a given Zone Kuma CP.

kuma.mesh.v1alpha1.ZoneIngressInsight.title: Zone Ingress Insight
kuma.mesh.v1alpha1.ZoneIngressInsight.description: ZoneIngressInsight defines the observed state of a Zone Ingress.
